pages.text: While the Alchemical Station is a very handy machine, it can't brew anything on its own. Because of that, I had to design a new machine, able to combine ingredients into a small phial. This is exactly what the Synthesis Station is.To use it, I have to add fuel, Blaze Powder, in the heater. Then add the ingredients and an empty phial in the right slots. After a while, a freshly-brewed potion comes out.
